00001 #include <bgp.h>
00002 
00003 tw_event *
00004 bgp_timer_cancel(tw_event * tmr, tw_lp * lp)
00005 {
00006         tw_memory       *b;
00007 
00008         if(tmr && NULL != tmr->memory)
00009         {
00010                 b = tmr->memory;
00011                 tmr->memory = NULL;
00012                 tw_memory_free(lp, b, g_ospf_fd);
00013         }
00014 
00015         if(tmr && tw_now(lp) == tmr->recv_ts)
00016                 tmr = NULL;
00017         else if(tmr)
00018         {
00019                 rn_timer_cancel(lp, &tmr);
00020         }
00021 
00022         return NULL;
00023 }
00024 
00025 /*
00026  * start the timer 
00027  */
00028 tw_event *
00029 bgp_timer_start(bgp_nbr * nbr, tw_event * tmr, tw_stime ts, int type, tw_lp * lp)
00030 {
00031         tw_memory       *b;
00032         ospf_message    *m;
00033 
00034         ts = tw_now(lp) + ts;
00035 
00036         /* THIS CONDITIONAL IS NECESSARY!! */
00037         /* Don't do anything if the timer is already set for this time! */
00038         if(tmr && tw_now(lp) >= tmr->recv_ts)
00039                 tmr = NULL;
00040         else if(tmr && ts == tmr->recv_ts)
00041                 return tmr;
00042 
00043         if(!tmr)
00044                 tmr = rn_timer_init(lp, ts);
00045         else
00046                 rn_timer_reset(lp, &tmr, ts);
00047 
00048         // Timer library will not allocate timers past end time!
00049         if(!tmr)
00050                 return NULL;
00051 
00052         if(NULL != tmr->memory)
00053                 b = tmr->memory;
00054         else
00055         {
00056                 b = tw_memory_alloc(lp, g_ospf_fd);
00057                 tw_event_memory_set(tmr, b, g_ospf_fd);
00058         }
00059 
00060         m = tw_memory_data(b);
00061 
00062         m->type = type;
00063         m->data = nbr;
00064 
00065         return tmr;
00066 }
